metadata.title: CVE-2024-11694 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Enhanced Tracking Protection's Strict mode may have inadvertently allowed aCSP `frame-src` bypass and DOM-based XSS through the Google SafeFrame shimin the Web Compatibility extension. This issue could have exposed users tomalicious frames masquerading as legitimate content. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 133, Firefox ESR < 128.5, Firefox ESR < 115.18,Thunderbird < 133, Thunderbird < 128.5, and Thunderbird < 115.18.

criterions.comment: mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
